long_description: Built to help you withstand extreme heat, the Seirus Caster Quick Shade hat shields your eyes and neck from the sun thanks to a long brim and attached sun cape that keeps you covered but cool. Versatile sun cape is a lightweight tube of fabric that can be worn as a cape, neck gaiter or even a headband. Lightweight, breathable nylon fabric wicks moisture away from skin. Internal headband keeps sweat out of your eyes. Cape and hat fabric include UPF 25 sun protection.
short_description: Built to help you withstand extreme heat, the Seirus Caster Quick Shade hat shields your eyes and neck from the sun thanks to a long brim and attached sun cape that keeps you covered but cool.
